name: Ginga Ojousama Densetsu Yuna 3: Lightning Angel
overview: Ginga Ojousama Densetsu Yuna 3: Lightning Angel (銀河お嬢様伝説ユナ３ ～ライトニング・エンジェル～) is an adventure game developed by Red and published by Hudson for the Sega Saturn. It is part of the Ginga Ojousama Densetsu Yuna series, which had previously only been released for the PC Engine CD.
